text:
Poutine! Chicken, Sausage and Original (BBQ) - all delicious.
And Beignets for dessert!
US fast food has nothing on this...
This place is an old school chicken and burger place.  Food is great!  Way better than typical fast food burger place and cheap as well.  Check it out if you're in Bedford

I have been going to this place for FORTY YEARS.  It is BEYOND delicious - fabulous EVERY TIME!!!

The chicken poutine is to die for - but I'm sure anything poutine would be great!!!
